item.title: NEM
item.description: score:67 Chances: Gold investors are assessing the situation and looking to 2024 for new market dynamics where the Fed is expected to begin cutting interest rates. Gold recently jumped to record highs and the precious metal is on track to see its best annual performance since 2020.
